name: lean-toy-dap-client
description: Side-loadable VS Code extension for the standalone toydap debug adapter binary.

source.description: Optional source file path shown in stack traces.

entryPoint.description: Optional built-in entry point name (mainProgram/sampleProgram) when no program/programFile is provided.

program.description: Toy program encoded as JSON statements (preferred).

programInfo.description: Optional source-aware payload (`Dap.ProgramInfo`) including statement spans for accurate source line mapping.

programFile.description: Path to a JSON file containing either a toy program array or a full `Dap.ProgramInfo` object.

programInfoFile.description: Path to a JSON file containing a `Dap.ProgramInfo` object.

toydapPath.description: Path to the toydap executable. Defaults to .lake/build/bin/toydap when present, otherwise toydap in PATH.

toydapArgs.description: Optional command-line arguments passed to toydap.

configurationSnippets.label: Lean Toy DAP
configurationSnippets.description: Debug the toy arithmetic language through the standalone toydap binary
